 function Z=rprod(X,Y)

Listing of function 

% row product
% function Z=rprod(X,Y)

function Z=rprod(X,Y)

[n m]=size(X);

if(length(Y(:,1)) ~=n  | length(Y(1,:)) ~=1)
  disp('Error in RPROD');
  return;
end

Z=X.*(Y*ones(1,m));
